body: "Are India and Pakistan ideological enemies?"  asks Dr. Niaz Murtaza at Pak Tea House. Murtaza thinks that both the countries should resolve their differences maturely by dialogue, not by other means.
original_body: "Are India and Pakistan ideological enemies?" asks Dr. Niaz Murtaza at Pak Tea House. Murtaza thinks that both the countries should resolve their differences maturely by dialogue, not by other means.
title: India And Pakistan: Ideological Enemies?
